name: Wild Arena
description: Wild Arena is a shooter where you have to defend yourselves and survive enemy attacks in small fighting zones with a main game mode and 3 secondary game modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: core i3, AMD FX 8000 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 260, AMD Radeon HD6750 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: core i5, AMD FX 9000 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 Ti, AMD Radeon HD6970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
